title: The First Four Weeks
snippet: My first four weeks of Graduate School at University of California, Irvine!

title: Exploring Blogs
snippet: Trying out creating a blog post and messing with formatting and such. Think of this one as the "Meta Blog".
content: This is where the text of a full post would go! This would be a more detailed explanation than the quick snippet seen before. I would add details here about whatever the post is.
